name: Ninja Rider - Endless Runner
description:
Ninja Rider is one of the most interactive yet simplest games! It provides players with a dose of fun they need while adding excitement to the whole experience. 

So, dash, collect coins, while dodging all the obstacles! This endless run is going to be very exciting. 

Help your Ninja Rider in collecting the coins while avoiding and jumping over robots and other obstacles. You can even attack robots with the sword to destroy them. Now, you can join the most adventurous and fun journey of Endless Runner.

We all desire a dose of fun in our busy lives. To cater this need, you are presented Ninja Rider, a game that can be quite simple yet so much fun and exciting to play. In fact, Ninja Rider offers you an enthralling experience and in no time you find yourself immersed in the game.

Story

Your protagonist is an Endless Runner and he is out to collect some money. Now, it is your duty to help him in his endless run to collect not only coins but also avoid different types of obstacles. There are seventy obstacles that are combined with each other to make a stage for endless run. Moreover, there are robots patrolling the areas. You can either dispel them or you can avoid them in your endless run. It is up to you. 
One of the most exciting things about Endless Runner is you have to continue thriving to run. As soon as you are killed, you will have to begin from the start. Therefore, you better watch the obstacles and overcome them to make your Endless Runner successful in his journey. 

This is not it yet! There are eight characters colors and 4 unique characters that you can unlock in this amazing game as well. Either you can unlock them or purchase them with currency. It means you can go on a run with different characters and make it even more fun.
Features

Music: You have the option of either listening to the music or muting it. You can choose either option as you want.

Counters: Actually, there are three counters in the game and these counters include: 

1. Health Counter: Now, this counter specifically displays your lives. You need to look out for it in your run and it will help you in being updated.
2. Coin Counter: Other than the health counter, you have a coin counter that tells how many coins you have gathered. If you have a target then it tells how many coins are left to achieve it.
3. Robot Counter: This counter how many robots are disabled. 

The game has no ads and will not interfere the user during the gameplay.

Attention! 

Google Play Version:

If you uninstall the game from your phone your progress and unlocked characters will deleted if you purchased with in game currency. For those who purchased 
Characters with with real currency through Google, unlocked characters will be save even if you uninstall of reset/format your phone.

Itch.oi Version:

If you uninstall the game from your phone or delete  your progress and unlocked characters will deleted if you purchased with in game currency. PC Version saves in the registry and even if you delete the game your progress is saved

You can buy everything with coins and kills.

Controls PC:

Z: Left

X: Right

Space: Jump

Space x2: Wall Jump

Left CTRL:Attack

Controls Mobile:

Left

Right

Jump x2

Attack
